data.title: Ghana Month: ATU Management Visits Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park – ACCRA TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY
data.text:
In a poignant journey through Ghana’s storied past, the management team of Accra Technical University embarked on a profound visit to the hallowed grounds of the Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park in Accra on March 11, 2024. Led by the Acting Vice-Chancellor, Prof. Amevi Acakpovi, the delegation undertook an exploration of the park, delving into the legacy of the nation’s first president.

Situated on Accra High Street, the Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park stands as a testament to Ghana’s rich history and the indelible mark left by its founding fathers. It is also an educational hub, preserving the history of the nation’s struggle for independence The park, home to the mausoleum and museum dedicated to Kwame Nkrumah, offers a window into the illustrious life and times of one of Africa’s most influential leaders.
